languages.text: "Проктор Соломон Антар, согласно Инъюнкта Кардинал, самовольная сдача поста арбитром равносильна дезертирству и предательству Империума — независимо от обстоятельств. Как смеешь ты трактовать дух Лекс Империалис и решать свою участь, если буква закона уже дала тебе смысл жизни и избавила от ереси сомнений?"

"Proctor Solomorne Anthar, according to the Injuncta Cardinal, an Arbitrator stepping down from their post without leave is to be treated as a deserter and a traitor to the Imperium regardless of circumstances. How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"
languages.original_text: "Проктор Соломон Антар, согласно Инъюнкта Кардинал, самовольная сдача поста арбитром равносильна дезертирству и предательству Империума — независимо от обстоятельств. Как смеешь ты трактовать дух Лекс Империалис и решать свою участь, если буква закона уже дала тебе смысл жизни и избавила от ереси сомнений?"

How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"

languages.text: “索罗蒙·安萨监察官，根据《红衣主教训谕》规定，法务官若是未经许可擅自离职，无论由于什么样的原因，都会被视为逃兵，是帝国的叛徒。帝皇的律法已经为你指明了目标，粉碎了怀疑的异端思想，你怎么敢在这种情况下擅自解释帝国律法的精神，自行决定你自己的命运？”
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, according to the Injuncta Cardinal, an Arbitrator stepping down from their post without leave is to be treated as a deserter and a traitor to the Imperium regardless of circumstances. How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙·安萨监察官，根据《红衣主教训谕》规定，法务官若是未经许可擅自离职，无论由于什么样的原因，都会被视为逃兵，是帝国的叛徒。帝皇的律法已经为你指明了目标，粉碎了怀疑的异端思想，你怎么敢在这种情况下擅自解释帝国律法的精神，自行决定你自己的命运？”

languages.text: 「ソロモーン・アンサール代理人、インユンクタ・カーディナルによれば、アービトレイターが許可なく職を退くことは、状況に関わらず脱走兵として、帝国への裏切り者と見なされる。陛下の法は君に目的を与え、疑うという異端的な思想を取り除いているというのに、レックス・インペリアの精神を勝手に解釈し、自分の運命を決める愚行を犯すとは愚かすぎる」
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, according to the Injuncta Cardinal, an Arbitrator stepping down from their post without leave is to be treated as a deserter and a traitor to the Imperium regardless of circumstances. How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン・アンサール代理人、インユンクタ・カーディナルによれば、アービトレイターが許可なく職を退くことは、状況に関わらず脱走兵として、帝国への裏切り者と見なされる。陛下の法は君に目的を与え、疑うという異端的な思想を取り除いているというのに、レックス・インペリアの精神を勝手に解釈し、自分の運命を決める愚行を犯すとは愚かすぎる」

languages.text: «Procurador Solomorne Anthar, de acuerdo con la Injuncta Cardinal, un Arbitrator que abandona su puesto sin permiso debe considerarse desertor y traidor al Imperium, independientemente de las circunstancias. ¿Cómo se atreve a interpretar el espíritu de la Lex Imperialis y decidir su propio destino cuando la literalidad de Su Ley ya le ha proporcionado un propósito y librado de la herejía de la duda?».
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, according to the Injuncta Cardinal, an Arbitrator stepping down from their post without leave is to be treated as a deserter and a traitor to the Imperium regardless of circumstances. How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"

traits.locale_text: «Procurador Solomorne Anthar, de acuerdo con la Injuncta Cardinal, un Arbitrator que abandona su puesto sin permiso debe considerarse desertor y traidor al Imperium, independientemente de las circunstancias. ¿Cómo se atreve a interpretar el espíritu de la Lex Imperialis y decidir su propio destino cuando la literalidad de Su Ley ya le ha proporcionado un propósito y librado de la herejía de la duda?».

languages.text: "Proktor Solomorne Anthar, laut Injuncta Cardinal ist ein Arbitrator, der ohne Erlaubnis seinen Posten verlässt, ungeachtet der Umstände als Deserteur und Verräter am Imperium zu behandeln. Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, das Lex Imperia selbst zu deuten und über Euer eigenes Schicksal zu entscheiden, wo doch der Text Seines Gesetzes Eure Aufgabe bereits vorgibt und Euch von ketzerischen Zweifeln befreit?"
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, according to the Injuncta Cardinal, an Arbitrator stepping down from their post without leave is to be treated as a deserter and a traitor to the Imperium regardless of circumstances. How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"

traits.locale_text: "Proktor Solomorne Anthar, laut Injuncta Cardinal ist ein Arbitrator, der ohne Erlaubnis seinen Posten verlässt, ungeachtet der Umstände als Deserteur und Verräter am Imperium zu behandeln. Wie könnt Ihr es wagen, das Lex Imperia selbst zu deuten und über Euer eigenes Schicksal zu entscheiden, wo doch der Text Seines Gesetzes Eure Aufgabe bereits vorgibt und Euch von ketzerischen Zweifeln befreit?"

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar... Esas Buyruklar'a göre izinsiz bir şekilde görevinden ayrılan bir Yargıcı, ne koşulda olursa olsun İmparatorluk'a ihanet etmiş bir kaçak olarak değerlendirilmelidir. O'nun Kanunları sana çoktan bir amaç vermiş ve şüphe gibi bir kâfirlikten kurtarmışken ne cüretle Lex İmperialis'in ruhunu yorumlayıp kendi kaderini belirlemeye kalkışırsın?"
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, according to the Injuncta Cardinal, an Arbitrator stepping down from their post without leave is to be treated as a deserter and a traitor to the Imperium regardless of circumstances. How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"

traits.locale_text: "Üsteğmen Solomorne Anthar... Esas Buyruklar'a göre izinsiz bir şekilde görevinden ayrılan bir Yargıcı, ne koşulda olursa olsun İmparatorluk'a ihanet etmiş bir kaçak olarak değerlendirilmelidir. O'nun Kanunları sana çoktan bir amaç vermiş ve şüphe gibi bir sapkınlıktan kurtarmışken ne cüretle Lex İmperialis'in ruhunu yorumlayıp kendi kaderini belirlemeye kalkışırsın?"

languages.text: « Proctor Solomorne Anthar... Selon l'Injuncta Cardinal, un arbitrator quittant son poste sans permission sera considéré comme un déserteur et un traître à l'Imperium, peu importent les circonstances. Comment osez-vous interpréter la Lex Imperialis et décider de votre propre destin, alors que Ses lois ont donné un but à votre existence et ont chassé vos doutes d'hérétique ?
languages.original_text: "Proctor Solomorne Anthar, according to the Injuncta Cardinal, an Arbitrator stepping down from their post without leave is to be treated as a deserter and a traitor to the Imperium regardless of circumstances. How dare you interpret the spirit of the Lex Imperialis and decide your own fate when the letter of His Law has already given you purpose and rid you of the heresy of doubt?"

traits.locale_text: « Proctor Solomorne Anthar...
